item.title: From Demo to Success: Beyond the Speech Algorithms of Modern Meetings (3/5)
item.description: Throughout this blog series, follow Seasalt.aiâ€™s journey to creating a well rounded Modern Meetings Experience, starting with its humble beginnings, to optimizing our service on different hardware and models, to integrating state-of-the-art NLP systems and finally ending on the full realization of SeaMeet, our collaborative modern meeting solutions.
